scripts.export-cli-module: cd ../..; cp -r build platforms/npm-cli-module/node-build; cd ./platforms/npm-cli-module; cp cli.js node-build/; cp package.json node-build/;
scripts.build-then-publish: cd ../..; npm run build; cd ./platforms/npm-cli-module; npm run clean-previous-build; npm run export-cli-module; echo WARNING REQUIRES NPM LOGIN BEFORE PUBLISHING!; cd node-build; npm publish
